mapper.select: SELECT id, asset_number as assetNumber, article_id AS articleId, type_id AS typeId, asset_type AS assetType, specification, article_name AS articleName, article_url AS articleUrl, article_introduction AS articleIntroduction, lease_enterprise AS leaseEnterprise, contact_name AS contactName, contact_phone AS contactPhone, lease_cash AS leaseCash, lease_price AS leasePrice, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, article_status AS articleStatus FROM tb_asset_article_lease_orders WHERE record_status = '1' and creator_account = #{account} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT tb.id, tb.asset_number AS assetNumber, tb.asset_number AS barCode, tb.article_id AS articleId, tb.type_id AS typeId, tb.asset_type AS assetType, tb.specification, tb.article_name AS articleName, tb.article_url AS articleUrl, tb.article_introduction AS articleIntroduction, tb.lease_enterprise AS leaseEnterprise, tb.contact_name AS contactName, tb.contact_phone AS contactPhone, tb.lease_cash AS leaseCash, tb.lease_price AS leasePrice, tb.start_time AS startTime, tb.end_time AS endTime, tb.article_status AS articleStatus, ta.lease_time AS leaseTime FROM tb_asset_article_lease_orders tb LEFT JOIN tb_asset_article_lease ta ON ta.id = tb.article_id WHERE tb.record_status = '1' AND tb.id = #{id}

SELECT id, asset_number as assetNumber, asset_type AS assetType, specification, article_name AS articleName, article_introduction AS articleIntroduction, lease_cash AS leaseCash, lease_price AS leasePrice, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, pay_sum AS paySum, create_time AS createTime FROM tb_asset_article_lease_orders WHERE record_status = '1' AND id = #{id}
